Description:
OneDrive has transformed from a file storage solution into a powerful, AI-driven content experience built for the modern workplace. In this session, explore how OneDrive is becoming the launchpad for productivity across Microsoft 365. Weâ€™ll unveil the latest innovations that put AI to work for you across sync, sharing, and all file interactions. Whether you're an IT administrator, end user, or knowledge worker, discover how OneDrive is evolving into the intelligent backbone of your digital workspace.

Chapters: 0:00 - Audience Engagement on OneDrive Usage History 00:07:42 - Demo: Simplified and Secure Sharing Experience with Hero Link 00:10:23 - Adjusting Access Permissions and Bug Demo 00:12:18 - Creating Time-Limited Sharing Links for External Users 00:19:24 - Copilot Demo: Summarizing and Creating FAQs from Shared Files 00:25:29 - Transition to OneDrive team award scenario and audience interaction 00:29:06 - Copilot agent generates personalized nominations and award names 00:33:20 - Switching from Mac to Windows and showing cross-device file synchronization 00:41:40 - Closing remarks with resources to stay connected with the OneDrive team
